turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Anya Sharma. It's been a real pain trying to get through on the phone!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can certainly help with that. Can you please provide your full name and date of birth to verify your identity?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Michael Davis, and my birthday is 03/15/1988.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Davis. I see your information. What is the reason for your appointment today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's for my annual physical. What days does Dr. Sharma have available next week?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check Dr. Sharma's availability. She has openings on Tuesday at 10:00 AM and Thursday at 2:30 PM next week. Which one works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, Thursday at 2:30 PM should work. But, out of curiosity, why is it so hard to get an appointment with her? Is she the only primary care physician taking new patients?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, Thursday at 2:30 PM is confirmed. Regarding your question, Dr. Sharma is a popular physician within our network, and demand for appointments with her is high. turns.speaker: user
